text: Happy to know, that you chose to get your MRI done at Deuk Spine institute.
In that case, would you like us to schedule an MRI Scan for you or you would prefer seeing us in person for a scan?

transitionRoutes.name: 5bb4d7a9-342c-4e71-9986-e4a804903606
transitionRoutes.description: This route will be triggered if the user who stays local agrees to get their MRI done at our facility.
